title: WWW
content: Mark Twain sometimes wrote science fiction? In one of them, he imagined the “telelectroscope,” a device that used telephone wires to create a world-wide communication network.

title: Internaut
content: The more someone knows about the Internet, its history and politics, the more likely the term internaut fits them.

title: HTML
content: A markup language that is used to create documents on the World Wide Web incorporating text, graphics, sound, video, and hyperlinks.
